name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Sales Engineer with 13+ years of experience in delivering high-performance solutions for diverse industries, including healthcare and finance. Exceptional communication and negotiation skills, with a proven track record in customer consulting and proposal preparation to understand and meet client needs effectively.
Expertise in utilizing CRM tools and MS Office for streamlined sales processes, enhancing customer relations, and driving growth. Bilingual in Italian, English, and German, facilitating engagement with a broader client base.
Possesses a strong technical foundation in **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, combined with hands-on experience in both frontend and backend development using **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Experienced in developing AI/ML-based platforms and deploying cloud-native solutions on **AWS** and **Azure**. Skilled in implementing **microservices**, **event-driven architectures**, and **CI/CD** pipelines, and well-versed in compliance standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS.
